ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except Your slaves among them who are sincere.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except the chosen ones among Your creatures."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except those of Your servants whom You have singled out for Yourself."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Except those among them who are Your chosen bondmen.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except Your chosen (guided) servants among them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except Thy servants from among them, the devoted ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: excepting those Thy servants among them that are devoted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save such of them as are Thy perfectly devoted slaves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But not such of them as are Thy bondmen single-hearted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except Your dedicated servants among them.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except Thy servants among them, sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except Your chosen, (guided) slaves among them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except the devoted amongst Your worshippers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Except for Your sincere servants among them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:40] except those servants of Yours who are sincerely devoted [to You]’, namely, believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save such of them as are Thy perfectly devoted slaves) those who are protected from me; it is also said that this means: those who profess monotheism.
